message: Sorry for making an off-topic topic, but I'm sure the apple-heads here might be able to share a few thoughts. By the way, I did not mean to make two of this topic. Oh well.
Since the first game I've ever experienced on a Mac was Myst (back in primary school), there is a personal connection between Macs and Myst for me. RIP Steven Jobs.
No steve jobs=no mac=no 2 minute printer setup=spending 2 months trying to do it on windows 7!
